Docs.param: The scope of the reservation summaries. The scope can be 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}' or 'providers/Microsoft.Capacity/reservationorders/{ReservationOrderId}/reservations/{ReservationId}'
Can be daily or monthly. Possible values include: 'DailyGrain', 'MonthlyGrain'
Required only for daily grain. The properties/UsageDate for start date and end date. The filter supports 'le' and 'ge'
The headers that will be added to request.
Docs.summary: Lists the reservations summaries for daily or monthly grain.
